주요 업무:
Purpose of the role
As a product compliance manager at Würth Korea, your key responsibility is to make sure that all items that we sell to our customers are compliant with the local laws when it comes to registrations, certifications, labeling and all other processes demanded by Korean regulation for products to be allowed to be imported and sold. Further, you are responsible for ensuring compliance in a timely matter, since our ambition is to grow our business by significantly increasing the number of products we are able to sell, which requires ensuring product compliance first.


The product compliance manager will take on all tasks that relate to product compliance. This currently entails especially all works related to the chemical compliance of technical chemical products:

1) Before import, chemical products need to follow the processes required by K-REACH and CCA (Chemical Control Act). This task will be executed with the support of partner organizations.
2) Further, some products need to comply with additional laws, such as the High pressure gas act, K-BPR, Clean Air Conservation Act, Petroleum and alternative fuel business act, KC regulations and others.
The relevant laws are to be identified per product and it has to be ensured that the legal requirements are followed 3) For all chemical products, safety data sheets (SDS) are provided with the help of a third party partner; here, following the K-OSHA regulation, the task is to register new SDS at the relevant authority and updating existing SDS in case of any relevant changes
4) Finally, all labels on chemical products need to comply with the demands resulting from Korean regulation and thus must be initially created (with the support of a partner on design end) and kept up to date

For all these tasks, the necessary execution and support mechanisms are available. The responsibility of the product compliance manager is to ensure correct, timely execution of all relevant compliance works. In order to do so successfully, collaboration with the international support team is crucial. Thus, English is the main language of communication in this role.

Moving forward into the future, the field of product compliance will further extend to ensuring compliance of for example power tools, other electrical machines (incl. displays), protective equipment etc.
